query: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.consultorId, c.name as mentor_name FROM alunos a LEFT JOIN consultors c ON a.consultorId = c.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Valci%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2kPX7CjhqdMFT8y.9c22f9f54902 --database 5n7arrGNHjNdoFCMzyGXcY --execute SELECT a.id, a.name, a.consultorId, c.name as mentor_name FROM alunos a LEFT JOIN consultors c ON a.consultorId = c.id WHERE a.name LIKE '%Valci%';
